data.title: Leicester: Book with eDreams
data.meta_description: Looking for cheap flights from Cork to Leicester? Count on eDreams and search for last minute deals on flights, useful travel tips and more!
data.text:
What are the benefits of booking flexible flight tickets?

Using the flexible flight ticket, you're guaranteed a refund or a rebooking option (without fees) in case of flight cancellations when travelling to United Kingdom. At eDreams have you covered!

For flights from Cork to Leicester, how can I find the cheapest price?

On eDreams we use machine learning to find the most economical flight between Cork and Leicester. By taking into account the combinations of airlines, stopovers, direct flights as well as the various criteria for the journeys, our search engine allows us to offer our customers the best price under the best conditions.

Is Leicester more expensive than Cork to visit?

Looking at taxi prices, a ride in Leicester costs an average of 3.80 EUR euros, 24% cheaper than Cork, with a fare of 5.00 EUR euros, while train tickets cost 84% more in Leicester: 3.68 EUR euros against 2.00 EUR euros in Cork. Comparing the price of a meal, they range from 17.82 EUR euros in Leicester, 1% less than the 18.00 EUR euros in Cork. The price of a coffee is approximately 2% cheaper in Leicester, with an average of 3.63 EUR euros, while in Cork the coffee costs 3.69 EUR.

What is the weather like in Leicester compared to Cork?

The average temperature in Cork the average temperature is 22.77 degrees in summer, with precipitation around 3.0 mm , Leicester's temperatures reach 28.15 during the hot season, with 12.0 average of rain rate . In winter, however, weather indicators show around -2.73 degrees in Leicester, compared to the -0.84 average degrees reported in Cork. During the winter period, Cork can register 12.0 mm precipitation, while Leicester have an average of 6.0 mm rain level.
